Description:
Are you passionate about capturing immersive experiences? Do you have an eye for detail and a knack for post-production magic? If so, we're looking for a dedicated Matterport (Insta360 X3) Camera Operator to join our team in Dubai!As a Camera Operator with our company, you will play a crucial role in creating stunning virtual tours of hotels. Your responsibilities include:Daily Schedule: Adhering to the provided schedule, which typically includes visiting 3-5 hotels per day.
Hotel Arrival: Arriving on time at each hotel and introducing yourself as a representative of our company. Collecting keys for 2-5 different types of rooms from the hotel manager.
Room Preparation: Before scanning, ensure that each room is ready:
All lights are on and functioning.
Room doors are open.
Fans are turned off.
Bins are hidden from view.
Cables are neatly concealed.
Curtains are open.
Toilet covers are closed.
Room Scanning: Performing scans of the rooms using the Insta360 X3 camera.
Naming Conventions: Properly naming each scan with the format "Hotel Name - Type of the Room" (e.g., Rove - King Bed).
Data Upload: Uploading all scans to the cloud at the end of each workday.
Basic Post-Production: Conducting basic post-production tasks, including editing descriptions based on a template, labeling floorplans, and creating highlight reels.
Editing Start Location: Adjusting the start location for virtual tours.
Reporting: Compiling and sending a daily list of completed rooms in each hotel.Skills
Skills: To excel in this role, you should meet the following criteria:

Minimum Experience: A minimum of 1 year of experience in a similar role is required.
Time Management: Strong time management skills to ensure timely completion of tasks.
Communication: Effective communication skills for interacting with hotel staff and reporting progress.
Driver's License: Possession of a valid driver's license.
Personal Vehicle: Access to a personal car for transportation.

Insta360 X3 camera
Monopod or tripod
Mobile phone or tablet that supports the Matterport Application (iOS or Android)

Guaranteed monthly salary of 6000 AED
Petrol reimbursement
This position is based in Dubai, and only candidates located in Dubai will be considered.

Data.Company Industry: Broadcast Media Production; Media Production; Photography
